meta.title: About Aviniti — AI-Powered App Development Company
meta.description: Learn about Aviniti, a Jordanian AI and app development company turning ideas into reality.

hero.title: Turning Ideas Into Reality
hero.description: Aviniti is an AI-powered app development company based in Jordan, dedicated to helping businesses launch exceptional digital products — faster, smarter, and more affordably.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Empowering Businesses Through Technology
mission.description: We believe every great business deserves a great app. Our mission is to democratize access to world-class software development by combining cutting-edge AI with deep engineering expertise.

values.title: Innovation First
values.description: We leverage AI at every step — from idea validation to development — to deliver smarter solutions faster.

values.title: Quality Without Compromise
values.description: Every app we build is production-grade, scalable, and designed to grow with your business.

values.title: Client Partnership
values.description: We don't just build apps — we become your technology partner, invested in your long-term success.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: No hidden fees, no surprises. You get clear timelines, honest estimates, and regular progress updates.

approach.label: Our Approach
approach.title: AI-Enhanced Development
approach.description: We use our proprietary AI tools to analyze your idea, estimate costs, and plan architecture before writing a single line of code — saving you time and money.

steps.title: Validate
steps.description: AI-powered idea analysis and market validation

steps.title: Estimate
steps.description: Instant, transparent cost and timeline estimates

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: App store deployment and go-to-market support

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Great?
cta.description: Whether you have a fully formed idea or just a spark of inspiration, we're here to help bring it to life.
